title: Scholar Sphere – Scholarship Management Platform
overview: Scholar Sphere is a comprehensive Scholarship Management System designed to help students easily discover and apply for scholarships offered by universities around the world. The platform simplifies the scholarship search and application process while providing administrative tools for managing users, scholarships, and applications efficiently.
functionality: Search and filter scholarships by country, university, degree level, or eligibility criteria
Apply directly for scholarships through the platform
View applied scholarships and track application status via User Dashboard
Admins manage users, scholarships, and universities via Admin Dashboard
Moderators review and approve/reject scholarship applications
Role management to promote/demote users between regular and moderator
CRUD operations for scholarships, universities, and applications
Optional analytics & reports for application trends and statistics

title: Feast Forward – Food Sharing Platform
overview: Feast Forward is a Food Sharing Website built to reduce food waste and promote community sharing. The platform allows users to share surplus food, request available food, and manage food requests through an intuitive and user-friendly interface.
functionality: Add food by providing details such as name, image, quantity, and pickup location
Update or delete shared food items
Browse all available foods for request
Request food directly through the platform
Track, update, or cancel food requests
Optional dashboard for managing shared and requested foods

title: LeafLog – Plant Care Tracker
overview: LeafLog is a Plant Care Tracker Web Application designed to help plant enthusiasts log, track, and manage the daily care of their houseplants. The platform offers personalized plant management features that make it easy for users to maintain healthy plants through consistent care routines.
functionality: Add new plants with details like name, species, and photo
Log watering, fertilizing, and repotting dates for each plant
Set reminders for upcoming plant care tasks
Track plant growth and overall health with logs and updates
Secure user login system to manage personalized plant data
Dashboard showing all plants and upcoming care tasks
